Container.Name: joal
Container.Overview: An open source command line RatioMaster with an optional WebUI.
Container.Requires:
Create appdata folder. Download the latest tar.gz release. Put config.json, clients, and torrents folder into appdata location. (current release: https://github.com/anthonyraymond/joal/releases/latest)
ex. `mkdir /mnt/user/appdata/joal && wget -c https://github.com/anthonyraymond/joal/releases/latest/download/joal.tar.gz && tar -xzf joal.tar.gz -C /mnt/user/appdata/joal/`

Config.Name: Web UI
Config.Description: Set to true to enable optional web content. (http://host:port/SECRET_OBFUSCATION_PATH/ui/)

Config.Name: server.port
Config.Description: The port to be used for both HTTP and WebSocket connection.

Config.Name: SECRET_OBFUSCATION_PATH
Config.Description: Use your own complicated path here (no slash, backslash, or any other non-alphanum char).

Config.Name: SECRET_TOKEN
Config.Description: Use your own secret token here (this is some kind of a password, choose a complicated one).
